triples.name: Formal methods
triples.relevance: The paper examines formal methods as the core technique for verification and validation of ML systems.

triples.name: Software verification
triples.relevance: The paper focuses on verification techniques to ensure ML systems meet their specifications.

triples.name: Software verification and validation
triples.relevance: The paper reviews both validation and verification approaches for ML system correctness.

triples.name: Machine learning
triples.relevance: Machine learning systems are the main subject of formal verification methods discussed in the paper.

triples.name: Artificial intelligence
triples.relevance: The paper examines formal methods applicable to AI and ML systems more broadly.

triples.name: Support vector machine
triples.relevance: The paper specifically reviews formal verification research works dedicated to support vector machines.

triples.name: Ensemble learning
triples.relevance: The paper reviews formal verification methods for decision tree ensembles as a specific ML technique.
